ygData.subject: Re: HIDEN SPELLS maybe important
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheh , Recipe , 1 Rune of Cold 1 Rune of Sneeze 1 Rune or Runny Nose Cast on NPC ! Voila ! he has the FLU ! Yeah yeah- I wont quit my Day Job ! ...
ygData.messageBody:
Heheh ,

Recipe ,

1 Rune of Cold
1 Rune of Sneeze
1 Rune or Runny Nose

Cast on NPC !
Voila ! he has the FLU !

Yeah yeah- I wont quit my Day Job !


--- James Guintu <james@...> wrote:
> From: "James Guintu" <james@...>
>
>
> You are probably right... I have a rune called the
> Rune of Cold. It doesn't
> appear on any of the recipe lists for researching
> spells... now if only we
> can find the books which describe how to make
> them...
>
>
